although_we_will_make_every_effort_to_se: Although we will make every effort to send Digital Currency to you as soon as possible, money from your chosen payment method may be deducted before the status of your Digital Currency Transaction is reported as complete and the Digital Currency is transferred to your Digital Currency Wallet.
